extendedInfo.description: "Crazy high replay value, Future Games Of London has delivered one of the best action games in the AppStore" - App Shack 4.5/5"This game makes me laugh the whole time I am playing." - AndroidRundown.com 10/10 PERFECT!** Massive JUNE Update **+ 5 Ships: Scout, Mustax, Hornet, Talonator and XenoClaw!+ 5 Landing Zones!+ Ship Upgrades: Speed, Shield, Crystal Attraction!+ Extra Lives!Grabatron is the latest massively addictive game from the makers of Hungry Shark.Take control of a UFO with a retractable claw and destroy the puny humans! Terrorise them anyway you like: Toss them, crush them, abduct them - it's up to you. Explore a huge and varied environment with hours of action packed gameplay. * Beautiful Graphics * Realistic Physics * Huge world to explore* Over 30 different missions * Both Tilt and Touch controls availableGrabatron - where being evil has never been so much fun...Check out - Brett Domino Trio: Earthquake (Labrinth Cover) ft. Grabatronhttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aTfbKW6_nxcNOTE:HTC Desire, Nexus One, Galaxy Ace users: Pause and resume the game if you experience slowdown issues 5-10mins into gameplay.

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: I have lots of fun playing this. Runs smoothly on my device. Definitely get this app! Stock Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Eric StormDweller

reviews.title: Update this thing already!
reviews.comment: Please add some new areas to the game! You haven\'t done an update in quite some time
reviews.author: gary burbage

reviews.title: Excellent...!
reviews.comment: Best action game ever played...love it very much...!!! Plz make such a wonderful games in future...! Keep it Up...!!!
reviews.author: yash Kulkarni

reviews.title: Grabatron
reviews.comment: Brilliant!! Ease of use, good graghics and good 60\'s si-fi style music,anymore games like this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: I like your originality.. Its the best game on the phone.. It was very addictive I love playing it.
reviews.author: Ser Louie Santos

reviews.title: It was fun!
reviews.comment: The game is so exciting. I hope FGOL will make the Grabatron Evolution such like as the Hungry Shark game. Five stars for this game. Sorry for my english.
reviews.author: Taqi Makarim

reviews.title: Inverted control option please
reviews.comment: Inventive and funny.  This game is definately worth the download and play, even if you don\'t want to spend cash on upgrades.  I just played it once a moment ago and it cracked me up.  Only one major complaint, for me the tilt control is counter intuitive.  I would love it if this game had the option to invert the up and down tilt functionality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love this one.   I also don\'t really ever comment on games or apps.   But I\'d like to see more from FGOL.  The Hungry Sharks are fun, but this one has excellent physics, lovely music, its addictive and challenging.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Game... but
reviews.comment: Yet another game ruined by the Free-to-Play model. I\'d much rather pay 3-5 bucks for it than be asked to buy crystals which would cost me much more in the long run.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of my favourite gamesgames
reviews.comment: This game is awesome, I have played for hours and downloaded it again after getting a new phone. Even after hours of gameplay it is still challenging without being frustrating, a perfect balance.
reviews.author: Grace Carr

reviews.title: Great quality
reviews.comment: Very fun. Creative. One of the best games on the android market.
reviews.author: Kyle M

reviews.title: Fun, with a catch...
reviews.comment: Yeah, I know most of these games are designed to get you to cough up some money.  But it\'s really lame when a supposedly free game basically forces you to purchase upgrades in order to make even modest progress.  That said, it\'s fun enough that I\'m sure many people will cough up some dough for said upgrades.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Scored 140368 which would\'ve been my high score but at the recap menu where it said \"New High Score\" it wasn\'t responding and force closed. Didn\'t save anything!! SO  upset!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game, should be optimized for tablet.
reviews.comment: Could you optimize the resolution for 10.1 tablets? This is my favorite game right now, but it seems like the graphics would be a lot sharper on a smaller screen. Makes me think it was intended for a phone. Still, excellent.
reviews.author: Pan Trimtab

reviews.title: Time spender. Needs a button change
reviews.comment: Everytime I die I keep moving my fingers by accident I hit the save me button. I can\' save up any money! Other than that.. It\'s a great game.
reviews.author: Z.G. Perry

reviews.title: One of my favorites
reviews.comment: I love this game... but only 4 stars because the price for crystals is outrageous. I\'m not usually one to buy something you can earn in the game... but for the right price I wouldn\'t mind a little boost. Also the rockets in the game say $0.99 but when you click it, it says $1.99.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grabatron- where being evil has never been so much fun
reviews.comment: Really excellent game. FGOL seems to do well with amusing destructive activities carried out in a large explorable environment. I want to say the ship upgrades were not obvious as the scroll down indicator was not very prominent. Took me a good while to realise there were upgrades to be had.
reviews.author: Yee Wei Tan

reviews.title: What can I say?
reviews.comment: What can I say? This is wonderfully a great! If you are bord then this is your game. Time passing, fun and is great! Just great.
reviews.author: Alex Bourlin

reviews.title: Worth your time
reviews.comment: Grabtron is a great game. It\'s fun and entertaining and definitely not one of those apps you use once in a blue moon. You\'ll keep playing and it gets even better you can connect with fb friends so you can beat their high score. Yes. This is a great game.
reviews.author: Kamili Saint-Leger

reviews.title: Fun game, touch controls could be better
reviews.comment: This game\'s pretty fun. Great time waster. my only gripe is that I\'m not a huge fan of the controls. They\'re either too sensitive or I can\'t get the claw to drop at times.
reviews.author: william spalding
